formattedContent.headline: Vibe Coding
formattedContent.content: Turn plain language into functional code. Imagine: "build a user login form" & AI does the rest. â€¢ Faster prototyping â€¢ Lower barrier to entry Idea to execution, instantly!

formattedContent.headline: AI Studio
formattedContent.content: No-code app generation from a single prompt. Describe it, deploy it. Perfect for rapid prototyping & sharing. From zero to live app in minutes!

formattedContent.headline: Firebase Studio
formattedContent.content: Full-stack app creation with integrated backend. Database, auth & more, all AI-powered. Launch production-ready apps, fast!

formattedContent.headline: Gemini Code Assist
formattedContent.content: AI-powered coding inside your IDE. Generates, explains, & tests code. Turbocharge your existing workflow!

formattedContent.headline: "Pure" Vibe Coding
formattedContent.content: Trust the AI output for rapid ideation. Great for throwaway weekend projects. Speed is the only goal!

formattedContent.headline: Responsible AI-Assisted Dev
formattedContent.content: Use AI as a pair programmer. Guide it, review the code, own the result. Quality & speed, combined!

formattedContent.headline: Vibe Coding Workflow
formattedContent.content: 1. Describe the goal 2. AI generates code 3. Execute & observe 4. Refine with feedback Repeat until done. Iterate faster, build better!

formattedContent.headline: Traditional vs Vibe Coding
formattedContent.content: Traditional = manual, precise. Vibe = natural language, AI-assisted. Focus on outcome, not implementation!

formattedContent.headline: Choosing Your Tool
formattedContent.content: AI Studio (fast ideas), Firebase Studio (full apps), Gemini (existing projects). Match the tool to the task!

formattedContent.headline: AI Studio
formattedContent.content: Describe your app, get a live preview, refine with prompts, deploy to Cloud Run. Share your creation with one click!

formattedContent.headline: Firebase Studio
formattedContent.content: Build complete applications with a robust backend. Perfect for scalable solutions. Go from idea to production, seamlessly!

formattedContent.headline: /12 Section
formattedContent.content: Vibe coding is NOT replacing programmers. It's augmenting them. Learn to leverage these tools. Adapt or be left behind. The future is now.
